tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_comments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  issue_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  tag_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES customer_feedback(feedback_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES common_issues(issue_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES feedback_categories(category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES feedback_tags(tag_id)
);
